author: Microsoft
name: Aspire Azure Agent Starter (Hosted Agent)
description: A project template for creating an Aspire Azure Agent with a Python backend API service

AzureSubscriptionId.description: The Azure Subscription ID where the Foundry Agent resources will be deployed.

AzureResourceGroup.description: The Azure Resource Group name where the Foundry Agent resources will be deployed.

AzureLocation.description: The Azure region where the Foundry Agent will be hosted.

AgentName.description: The name of the Foundry Agent.

AddFoundryRandomSuffix.description: If true, a random suffix will be added to the Agent name when creating the Foundry resource to ensure global uniqueness.

FoundryName.value: if (AddRandomSuffix) { var suffix = System.Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 8); return "-" + suffix; } else { return ""; }
